message: Starting test coverage review. Reading resource lifecycle analysis recommendations.

Analyzed existing documentation and test structure. Found NO dedicated resource cleanup tests. The project has tests/ directory with existing test files but nothing for cleanup_agent_resources(). Now checking implementation details in real_mcp_server.py.

Reviewed all implementation documentation. Identified testing gaps and requirements. Now creating comprehensive test coverage documentation and test suite covering: cleanup_agent_resources() unit tests, integration tests, daemon script tests, and 4 scenarios from analysis.

Created comprehensive TEST_COVERAGE_REVIEW.md (21KB) with full test specification. Now creating test_resource_cleanup.py with all 30+ test cases covering unit tests, integration tests, daemon tests, and 4 scenarios from analysis.

MISSION COMPLETE. Created comprehensive test coverage review and test suite. Deliverables: (1) TEST_COVERAGE_REVIEW.md - 21KB comprehensive analysis with 30+ test case specifications, (2) test_resource_cleanup.py - Full pytest suite with 8 unit tests, 2 integration tests, 4 daemon tests, 4 scenario tests, critical bug tests, and performance tests. Identified 2 critical bugs requiring fixes before deployment.
